name: Worms-like
description:
If You played Worms, this game will be very familiar to You.

Turn-based action\strategy with teams confrontation, terrain destruction and level editor.

Weapons have game-breaking rules, like homming, frag, timer and detonator on shard. These rules droped in containers with items. E.g: you can make homming frag-frag-grenade, shotgun with frag-bullets and so on.

Many thanks to Anton-vertolet for weapon and actor sprites!
